Entry.JapaneseText: ウォンティガってさ、仮面かぶってたよネ？ あの仮面の下って、どうなってるか知ってる？
Entry.EnglishText: Wontiga was wearing a mask, right? What do you think he's hiding under it?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……仮面の下？ もう、<Mao>…… また、コワイ話、するつもりなんでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh... What's under the mask? Oh, <Mao>, are you trying to tell another scary story?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちがうヨ、ただの好奇心だってば。 <Annie>だって、キョウミあるでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: No, I'm just curious. Aren't you interested too?

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、教えてあげるネ！ 実は……あの仮面を取ると……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'll tell you then! The truth is... If you remove that mask, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃあーッ!! やっぱりコワイ話じゃないの！ もうッ、<Mao>！！！
Entry.EnglishText: Aaah!! You <Italics>were<NoItalics> telling a scary story! Oh, <Mao>!!
